If you spend the day in La Rambla, you might need to refuel on energy.  If so, get your tired butt and blistered feet to Kiosko!Kiosko is soooo good that you need to be prepared to wait in line.  Don't worry.  You have to fill out a form of what you want to order.  Kiosko has menus in English, Spanish and, I think if I recall right, German.I had a chicken burger and my fiance had a hamburger.  Man, I definitely wasn't expecting a huge burger but we weren't complaining.  Fries were good as well.  Overall, it was heavenly!Seating may be a challenge.  We got good seats.  However, there are some seats by the line which barely gives you any room to pull out the chair and dine.  I don't know what they were thinking unless they were trying to take advantage of having as many people in the building as possible.Overall, service was good as well as the food.
